description: Discover the essential components and challenges of NFT infrastructure, including blockchain, smart contracts, token standards, marketplaces, and storage solutions. Learn about the importance of interoperability, infrastructure challenges, and emerging trends in NFT technology.
keywords: NFT infrastructure, blockchain, smart contracts, token standards, NFT marketplaces, digital ownership, interoperability, NFT challenges, fractional ownership, metaverse, DeFi, NFTs
title: Exploring NFT Infrastructure: The Backbone of Digital Ownership
